verbose_text: Sudies have identified that caspase-3 is a potent, terminal caspase that plays a crucial role in executing apoptosis through the mitochondrial dependent pathway and increased neuronal caspase-3 expression has been observed in transient ischemic injury.
evidence: caspase that plays a crucial role in executing apoptosis through the mitochondrial-dependent pathway               and increased neuronal caspase-3 expression has been observed in transient ischemic injury
